createWalletPage.backupStep.title: No Backup, No Money
createWalletPage.backupStep.description: You must save the secret phrase. It is crucial for accessing your account or Do it later.
createWalletPage.backupStep.warningTitle: Treat your backup phrase with care!
createWalletPage.backupStep.warningNote1: You are solely responsible for keeping your funds. No one else, not even Tomodex, can help you recover your wallet if you lose it.
createWalletPage.backupStep.warningNote2: 12 words that are both the “User ID” and password. Anyone who knows your mnemonic phrase can access your wallet, so keep it safe.
createWalletPage.backupStep.mnemonicSubT: Please carefully write down these 12 words or
createWalletPage.backupStep.mnemonicNote: You will confirm this phrase on the next screen.
